gillespy2.stochss package¶

Submodules¶

gillespy2.stochss.StochSSexport module¶

Module for exporting GillesPy2 model as StochSS Live! models.

gillespy2.stochss.StochSSexport.export(model, path=None, return_stochss_model=False)[source]¶

GillesPy model to StochSS converter

Parameters:

  • model (gillespy.Model) – GillesPy model to be converted to StochSS

  • path (str) – Path to the StochSS file for conversion
